languages.text: "Плечом к плечу как-то слишком близко, мало ли — рванешь еще. Давай хотя бы на расстоянии вытянутой руки?"

traits.locale_text: "Плечом к плечу как-то слишком близко, мало ли — рванешь еще. Давай хотя бы на расстоянии вытянутой руки?"

languages.text: "Shoulder to shoulder is a little too close for comfort — after all, you might lose control again. To be safe, arm's length would seem more appropriate."
languages.original_text: "Плечом к плечу как-то слишком близко, мало ли — рванешь еще. Давай хотя бы на расстоянии вытянутой руки?"

traits.locale_text: "Shoulder to shoulder is a little too close for comfort — after all, you might lose control again. To be safe, arm's length would seem more appropriate."
"Shoulder to shoulder is a little too close for comfort — after all, you might lose control again. To be safe, arm's length would seem more appropriate."
"Shoulder to shoulder is a little too close for comfort — after all, you might lose control again. To be safe, arm's length would seem more appropriate."
"Shoulder to shoulder is a little too close for comfort — after all, you might lose control again. To be safe, arm's length would seem more appropriate."

languages.text: “并肩作战有点太近了，让人感觉不太舒服，毕竟你可能会再次失控。为了安全起见，保持手臂的距离似乎更合适。”
languages.original_text: "Shoulder to shoulder is a little too close for comfort — after all, you might lose control again. To be safe, arm's length would seem more appropriate."

traits.locale_text: “并肩作战有点太近了，让人感觉不太舒服，毕竟你可能会再次失控。为了安全起见，保持手臂的距离似乎更合适。”

languages.text: «Estar hombro con hombro es algo inquietante; podría volver a perder el control, después de todo. Será más seguro guardar las distancias».
languages.original_text: "Shoulder to shoulder is a little too close for comfort — after all, you might lose control again. To be safe, arm's length would seem more appropriate."

traits.locale_text: «Estar hombro con hombro es algo inquietante; podría volver a perder el control, después de todo. Será más seguro guardar las distancias».

languages.text: 「肩と肩を並べるというのは少々近すぎる…結局、お前は再び制御を失う可能性もある。安全のためには、腕の距離くらいがちょうどいいだろう」
languages.original_text: "Shoulder to shoulder is a little too close for comfort — after all, you might lose control again. To be safe, arm's length would seem more appropriate."

traits.locale_text: 「肩と肩を並べるというのは少々近すぎる…結局、お前は再び制御を失う可能性もある。安全のためには、腕の距離くらいがちょうどいいだろう」

languages.text: "Schulter an Schulter ist mir ein wenig zu nah — schließlich könntet Ihr jederzeit wieder die Kontrolle verlieren. Um sicher zu gehen, wäre eine Armlänge Abstand ratsamer."
languages.original_text: "Shoulder to shoulder is a little too close for comfort — after all, you might lose control again. To be safe, arm's length would seem more appropriate."

traits.locale_text: "Schulter an Schulter ist mir ein wenig zu nah — schließlich könntet Ihr jederzeit wieder die Kontrolle verlieren. Um sicher zu gehen, wäre eine Armlänge Abstand ratsamer."

languages.text: « Pas trop près à mes côtés, quand même. Après tout, rien ne dit que vous n'allez pas encore perdre le contrôle. Il faudra garder une distance minimum de sécurité. »
languages.original_text: "Shoulder to shoulder is a little too close for comfort — after all, you might lose control again. To be safe, arm's length would seem more appropriate."

traits.locale_text: « Pas trop près à mes côtés, quand même. Après tout, rien ne dit que vous n'allez pas encore perdre le contrôle. Il faudra garder une distance minimum de sécurité. »

languages.text: "Omuz omuza fazla samimi oldu sanki. Sonuçta kontrolü kaybetmek, yapmadığın şey değil. Ne olur ne olmaz sen yine bir kol mesafesinde dur."
languages.original_text: "Shoulder to shoulder is a little too close for comfort — after all, you might lose control again. To be safe, arm's length would seem more appropriate."

traits.locale_text: "Omuz omuza fazla samimi oldu sanki. Sonuçta kontrolü kaybetmek yapmadığın şey değil. Ne olur ne olmaz sen yine bir kol mesafesinde dur."
